nodes.text: The Neo-Crusader War Forges were factories set up and operational on many worlds during the Mandalorian Wars.

Revolutionizing the Mandalorian war production, the Neo-Crusader War Forges were set up by Cassus Fett on planets the forces used as staging areas, including but not limited to Jebble and Tarnith. An important component in the success of the Neo-Crusaders, the War Forges mass produced armors, weapons and starships, ready to supply new recruits with equipment.
